title: 'Does not retain heat for long-time'
body: I been using cello and I bought Borosil as back up. Firstly it doesn't serve the purpose of heat retention which I can not expect water inside to be hot after 3 to 4 hours. Secondly its not dishwashers safe. I always see scales on the rim and give me headache while cleaning manually. Thirdly, the cap design should have been better. After few weeks of usage, the holder broke and came off, ever since it is leaking. And last but the most irritating thing is, unlike my cello, the rim is of worst design I can not pour properly
